pages.text: $(li)Endergrades are fluffy flying creatures that can be found near Chorus Plants in the End.$(br)$(li)Using a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/chorus_on_a_stick)Chorus Fruit on a Stick$(/l) you can ride them, as a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pig)Pig$(/l) on the Overworld.
$(li)They are slow but you can use them to fly on the End, that makes them very useful.

$(li)If an $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/enderiophage)Enderiophage$(/l) infects an Endergrade, it will die in a few minutes unless it eats a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chorus_fruit)Chorus Fruit$(/l).
